byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Popolo d'Italia says Italy is at war on econ front
snippet: ROME, Jan. 31--Premier Mussolini's newspaper, the Popolo d'Italia --and quite possibly the Premier himself, who usually writes its editorials--warns Italians not to be softened by fair words from France....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: ITALIANS ARE WARNED TO BEWARE OF FRANCE; Mussolini's Newspaper Replies to Friendly Paris Journal

lead_paragraph: ROME, Jan. 31--Premier Mussolini's newspaper, the Popolo d'Italia --and quite possibly the Premier himself, who usually writes its editorials--warns Italians not to be softened by fair words from France.
